faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started

q1.question: How much does a website cost?
q1.answer: The cost depends on your specific needs. We offer solutions starting from 1500€ for a showcase website, with financing options available through France Num subsidies.

q2.question: What are the delivery times?
q2.answer: A showcase website is typically delivered in 2-4 weeks. For e-commerce or more complex projects, expect 4-8 weeks depending on features.

q3.question: Do you offer maintenance?
q3.answer: Yes, we offer monthly maintenance packages including updates, backups, security and technical support.

q4.question: How does the France Num subsidy work?
q4.answer: As a France Num Activator, we help you benefit from up to 500€ in subsidies for your digitalization project. We handle the administrative procedures.

q5.question: Where do you operate?
q5.answer: Based in Dunkirk, we primarily serve Nord-Pas-de-Calais: Dunkirk, Calais, Lille, Boulogne-sur-Mer... We come to you for meetings and shoots. We also work remotely with clients outside the region.
